text: Following World War III, all the nations of the world agreed to 50 years of strict isolation from one another in order to prevent additional conflicts. 50 years later, the United States comes out of exile, only to learn that no one else went into isolation.

Following World War III, all the nations of the world agreed to 50 years of strict isolation from one another in order to prevent additional conflicts. 50 years later, the United States comes out of exile, only to learn that no one else went into isolation. The world is a new place, and it's up to the U.S. to figure out who their allies will be in this brave new world. The laders of the US feel betrayed that no one else stuck to the agreement. It turns out, there was actually a third world war about 10 years after the US went into isolation, and the war was long over by now. It was entirely different world with different nations being the most powerful and some nations were not even around anymore.

It was entirely different world with different nations being the most powerful and some nations were not even around anymore. 

In addition, this series takes place in a completely different world than the one featured in its predecessor, "The Fallen Angels".

Following World War III, all the nations of the world agreed to 50 years of strict isolation from one another in order to prevent additional conflicts. 50 years later, the United States comes out of exile, only to learn that no one else went into isolation. The world is a new place, and it's up to the U.S. to figure out who their allies will be in this brave new world. The leaders of the US feel betrayed that no one else stuck to the agreement. It turns out, there was actually a third world war about 10 years after the US went into isolation, and the war was long over by now. It was entirely different world with different nations being the most powerful and some nations were not even around anymore. 

The entirety of mainland Asia was now either Russia, China, or India, with Japan off doing its own thing and staying independent and neutral. Most of Africa was taken over by Egypt and Saudi Arabia and most of the countries in Europe formed together to make larger, more power nations. Norway, Sweden, and Finland were now just Scandinavia and all of the nations in the United Kingdom officially formed together and became just The United Kingdoms of England.

It was entirely different world with different nations being the most powerful and some nations were not even around anymore. 

The entirety of mainland Asia was now either Russia, China, or India, with Japan off doing its own thing and staying independent and neutral. Most of Africa was taken over by Egypt and Saudi Arabia and most of the countries in Europe formed together to make larger, more power nations. Norway, Sweden, and Finland were now just Scandinavia and all of the nations in the United Kingdom officially formed together and became just The United Kingdoms of England. All of Latin America formed into the Union, with the exception of Mexico and Cuba.

Following World War III, all the nations of the world agreed to 50 years of strict isolation from one another in order to prevent additional conflicts. 50 years later, the United States comes out of exile, only to learn that no one else went into isolation. The world is a new place, and it's up to the U.S. to figure out who their allies will be in this brave new world. The leaders of the US feel betrayed that no one else stuck to the agreement. It turns out, there was actually a third world war about 10 years after the US went into isolation, and the war was long over by now. It was entirely different world with different nations being the most powerful and some nations were not even around anymore. 

The entirety of mainland Asia was now either Russia, China, or India, with Japan off doing its own thing and staying independent and neutral. Most of Africa was taken over by Egypt and Saudi Arabia and most of the countries in Europe formed together to make larger, more power nations. Norway, Sweden, and Finland were now just Scandinavia and all of the nations in the United Kingdom officially formed together and became just The United Kingdoms of England.  All of Latin America formed into the Union, with the exception of Mexico and Cuba. Cuba remained independent and neutral and served as a major port hub for other nations so they were enjoying a new era of riches and prosperity. 

The US was looking for an ally because everything was so shaken up, so they turned to their neighbors of the North; the always neutral, always friendly, Canada. Canada had stayed out of the war and stayed neutral throughout it even though it was constantly cajoled by France and Spain to join the war.

Canada's leaders ignored the calls but it turned out that keeping quiet wasn't enough to keep them out of this war.

The entirety of mainland Asia was now either Russia, China, or India, with Japan off doing its own thing and staying independent and neutral. Most of Africa was taken over by Egypt and Saudi Arabia and most of the countries in Europe formed together to make larger, more power nations. Norway, Sweden, and Finland were now just Scandinavia and all of the nations in the United Kingdom officially formed together and became just The United Kingdoms of England.  All of Latin America formed into the Union, with the exception of Mexico and Cuba. Cuba remained independent and neutral and served as a major port hub for other nations so they were enjoying a new era of riches and prosperity. 

The US was looking for an ally because everything was so shaken up, so they turned to their neighbors of the North; the always neutral, always friendly, Canada. Canada had stayed out of the war and stayed neutral throughout it even though it was constantly cajoled by France and Spain to join the war. Canada's leaders ignored the calls but it turned out that keeping quiet wasn't enough to keep them out of this war. Because they stayed out, they also were enjoying an era of prosperity. 

The world was a new and scary place, and the US was going to have to be careful navigating the new political climate as they try to find their new place in the world. Undoubtedly, they would not be considered a superpower anymore because they had nothing to do with any conflicts in the past 50 years. They were now considered a middle country like Canada and Cuba. 

With a new ally in Canada, the US was ready to explore the new world and the new global political landscape. Hopefully they will be able to stay out of any conflicts, as tensions were high. With Canada by their side, the US felt confident that they can find their way in this brave new world.
